prompts.title: Title
prompts.subTitle: Subtitle
prompts.createAnotherInbound: Do you want to add or edit another inbound?
prompts.existingFLPConfig: Keep in mind that this project already has created a Fiori Launchpad Configuration. If you create a new configuration, it will completely overwrite the existing one.
prompts.copyFromExisting: Copy Configurations From an Existing Inbound?

tooltips.inboundId: Choose the inbound ID that will be used to set the FLP tile configuration
tooltips.additionalParameters: Enter the value for the parameters in the Target Mappings section from the URL mentioned above
tooltips.semObjectActionDuplication: When generating a new tile, you must modify the Semantic Object value or the Action value, or both. You can use the default suggestions, which include a '_New' suffix for each value, or choose to introduce your specific designations.

validators.inboundConfigKeyExists: An inbound configuration with the key: '{{inboundKey}}' is already defined.
validators.invalidParameterString: Parameter string is not a valid JSON.
validators.duplicateInbound: The base application has an existing inbound that matches the values for Semantic Object and Action. To create a new tile you must modify the Semantic Object value or  the Action value, or both.
